Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Store's popular reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Store - Reviews admin.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Showroom's popular reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Showroom - Reviews admin.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Store's most commented reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Store - Reviews admin.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Showroom's most commented reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Showroom - Reviews admin.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Store's most liked reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Store - Reviews admin.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays list of Showroom's most liked reviews. Setting for this widget is available in widget settings tab of Showroom - Reviews admin.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: This widget forms the Reviews tab on the Store Profile and displays the reviews of the Store. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Store Profile.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: This widget forms the Reviews tab on the Showroom Profile and displays the reviews of the Showroom. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Showroom Profile.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays a Store's review ratings on it's profile.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays a Showroom's review ratings on it's profile.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the top rated Stores of the site.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the top rated Showrooms of the site.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the most recent reviews of the site.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the most recent reviews of the site.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: This widget shows the top reviewers for the Stores on your site based on the number of reviews posted by them.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: This widget shows the top reviewers for the Showrooms on your site based on the number of reviews posted by them.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays Featured Reviews as chosen by you from the Manage Ratings & Reviews section in the admin panel of this extension.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays Featured Reviews as chosen by you from the Manage Ratings & Reviews section in the admin panel of this extension.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Review of the Day for Stores as selected by the Admin from the widget settings section of Reviews and Ratings Extension.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Review of the Day for Showrooms as selected by the Admin from the widget settings section of Reviews and Ratings Extension.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: This tabbed AJAX widget concisely shows important information about reviews in 3 tabs: Recent, Popular, Top Reviewers.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: This tabbed AJAX widget concisely shows important information about reviews in 3 tabs: Recent, Popular, Top Reviewers.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays popular reviews for Stores on your site. From the edit popup of this widget, you can set the number of reviews to show in this widget and the criteria for popularity.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays popular reviews for Showrooms on your site. From the edit popup of this widget, you can set the number of reviews to show in this widget and the criteria for popularity.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: This widget should be placed on the Store Review View Store.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: This widget should be placed on the Showroom Review View Showroom.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the form for searching Store Reviews on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the form for searching Showroom Reviews on the basis of various filters. You can edit the fields to be available in this form.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Commented Store Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Commented Showroom Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Liked Store Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the Most Liked Showroom Reviews. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Store Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the ReviewDetails. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.
Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: Displays the ReviewDetails. You can choose the number of entries to be shown.

Showroom Profile Popular Reviews: This is the view Showroom for a Showroom review.
